mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Interchange Freeway", "Box the Bugs", and "On My Mind" ROUND DANCES "Waltz a Little" and "Penny Waltz" SPECIAL FEATURES "5th National Square Dance Convention", "Rodeo Features Square Dancing", "Book Review", "Square Dancing in the Nineties As Seen in a Doctor's Notebook", "You Ain't Seen Nothin' Yet!", and "Ozark Jubilee Has Square Dancing Underground". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "The Square of the Month","From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
